channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OH

item.title: Report E-2023100189
item.description:
Report E-2023100189

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-09
  • City: COLUMBUS
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one of the metal 55 gallon drums of resin (un1866) releasing 2 gallons of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023090608
item.description:
Report X-2023090608

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-08
  • City: GROVEPORT
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package received an Inbound scan at 8:00am, and a Status Code 15 entered in at 8:16am. DescribePack: The top of the lid on one bottle was severed off, the threaded part of the lid is in tact.. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was put into large clear durable bag.

item.title: Report X-2023090599
item.description:
Report X-2023090599

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-08
  • City: GROVE CITY
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Certified personnel were notified of a distressed package, which was pulled from the system. Leakage was contained to the box. Package was placed in a lined red tote. DescribePack: One of the bottles had a crack in the bottom allowing for leakage. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Pads and neutralizing powder were used soak up the liquid and placed in a lined red tote.

item.title: Report X-2023090597
item.description:
Report X-2023090597

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-08
  • City: GROVE CITY
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Certified personnel were notified of a distressed package, which was pulled from the system. Leakage was contained to the box. Package was placed in a lined red tote. DescribePack: Package was discovered wet and upon inspection, the caps were found loose allowing for leakage. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Caps were tightened to stop further leaking

item.title: Report X-2023090594
item.description:
Report X-2023090594

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-07
  • City: PERRYSBURG
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was found 9-7 at 9p in the unload area, carton was wet and was brought to QA for inspection DescribePack: inner containers had loose lids which caused internal leakage DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: ppe was used to contain package in a plastic hazmat bag which was then placed in a sealed plastic tote

item.title: Report X-2023090582
item.description:
Report X-2023090582

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-07
  • City: TWINSBURG
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found damaged and was put into a tote for damage processing. DescribePack: The lid of one of the cans was dented which caused the lid to come off causing leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was put into a tote to mitigate the effects of the release.

item.title: Report E-2023090845
item.description:
Report E-2023090845

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-05T15:12:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-02
  • City: OREGON
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: K-Limited Carrier LTD
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The K-Limited Carrier LTD driver had just completed loading the trailer with sulfuric acid. The driver was attempting to relieve the pressure from the loading line when he was sprayed with a small amount of sulfuric acid. It appears that the loading line was over-pressurized which caused the product to be released. The plant personnel handled the clean-up. The driver was treated and released at a local hospital.

item.title: Report X-2023090554
item.description:
Report X-2023090554

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-05T15:12:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-07
  • City: RICHFIELD
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was taken to the van lines on a tugger then reported to be damaged shortly after. Spill cleaned up and taken to QA DescribePack: 5 gallon Jerrican punctured on the bottom. Very small puncture hole causing leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Spill contained and cleaned up with spill fix

item.title: Report X-2023090548
item.description:

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Certified personnel were notified of a distressed package, which was pulled from the system. Leakage was contained to the box. Package was placed in a lined red tote. DescribePack: Package was discovered wet and upon inspection, One of the press and twist caps was loose allowing leakage. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Caps were tightened to stop further leaking.
